alert.note: Alert for West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:56AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Otter Tail County through 345 AM CDT... At 256 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dunvilla, or 16 miles southwest of Detroit Lakes, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lake Lida around 305 AM CDT. Maplewood State Park and Erhard around 310 AM CDT. Edwards and Star Lake around 315 AM CDT. Phelps around 330 AM CDT. Underwood around 340 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Fergus Falls Airport. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 46 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
